author: Giorgio Valentini
title: An experimental bias--variance analysis of SVM ensembles based on resampling techniques
window: we randomly split all the available data in a training and a test set of about equal size, except for the Grey Landsat data set for which we maintained the original size for both the training and test set. To measure the bias--variance decomposition of error, for each data set we used 100 sets (parameter n = 100 in Sect.
